arts.ttl: Draw with West Brom sends Cardiff down to League One
arts.sum: The Bluebirds will spend next season in the third tier of English football for the first time since 2003.

arts.ttl: ‘A kick up the backside’ – Cardiff City vs West Brom prediction: The72
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Cardiff City vs West Brom prediction ahead of the Championship clash on Saturday. The post ‘A kick up the backside’ – Cardiff City vs West Brom prediction: The72 appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
